title: STK Steakhouse operates in multiple countries
statement: STK Steakhouse has restaurant locations in the United States, Canada, Mexico, Puerto Rico, Qatar, United Arab Emirates, England, and Italy.

citations.quote: Arizona, California, Colorado, D.C., Florida, Georgia, Illinois, Massachusetts, Mexico Los Cabos, Nevada, New York, North Carolina, Puerto Rico San Juan, Tennessee, Texas, Utah, Washington, Ontario, Qatar Doha, United Arab Emirates Dubai, England London, Italy Milan
